description: Gets predictions for a given utterance, in the form of intents and entities. The current maximum query size is 500 characters.

compositeentities.description: The composite entities extracted from the utterance.

alteredquery.description: The corrected utterance (when spell checking was enabled).

verbose.description: If true, return all intents instead of just the top scoring intent.

bing_spell_check_subscription_key.description: The subscription key to use when enabling bing spell check

entities.description: The entities extracted from the utterance.

timezone_offset.description: The timezone offset for the location of the request.

query.description: The input utterance that was analyzed.

intents.description: All the intents (and their score) that were detected from utterance.
